channel.title: Command Line Client
channel.description: I'm currently working on a command line driven player bot for use on private servers, and I was wondering what are some of the vitals I need for login, I've found plenty of documentation on making the server accept connection, but not on how to make the client send a connection request, any ideas?

item.title: Command Line Client
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I’m currently working on a command line driven player bot for use on private servers, and I was wondering what are some of the vitals I need for login, I’ve found plenty of documentation on making the server accept connection, but not on how to make the client send a connection request, any ideas?

Read full topic
